features.title: Comprehensive Tender Management
features.subtitle: PLANIFI combines all the tools you need to win more tenders in one powerful, easy-to-use platform.

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.description: Secure authentication with role-based access control for seamless team collaboration on tenders.
userManagement.benefit: Keep your sensitive tender documents secure while enabling team collaboration.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Customize your projects with unique views: Kanban, Gantt, and List views.
projectManagement.benefit: Never miss a tender deadline with visual progress tracking.

documentRepository.title: Document Repository
documentRepository.description: Intelligent document management with version control and template library.
documentRepository.benefit: Find the right documents instantly and maintain perfect version history.

organizationManagement.title: Organization Management
organizationManagement.description: Manage your team's resumes, skills, and company structure for faster tender responses.
organizationManagement.benefit: Reduce response time by 40% with ready-to-use company information.

tenderManagement.title: Tender Management
tenderManagement.description: Discover, track, and respond to tender opportunities all in one place.
tenderManagement.benefit: Never miss a relevant tender opportunity with smart alerts.

builtinTools.title: Built-in Tools
builtinTools.description: Essential tools including resume builder, currency converter, and compliance checkers.
builtinTools.benefit: Save time with specialized tools designed for tender success.
